item.itemvalue: Attach to Unity Editor.Attach to Unity Editor
Attach to Unity Editor.Attach to Unity Editor & Play

task.summary: up and running with 2018 but editor still looks like it has broken prefabs
Seperated out state management so that it can be held on client and server using the same objects
Got the gameboard and hand state preserved on the server as well as the client.
Got the cards in the hand workign well, moving on to being able to change the size of GRIDXDIM and GRIDYDIM

MESSAGE.value: up and running with 2018 but editor still looks like it has broken prefabs
Seperated out state management so that it can be held on client and server using the same objects
Got the gameboard and hand state preserved on the server as well as the client.
Got the cards in the hand workign well, moving on to being able to change the size of GRIDXDIM and GRIDYDIM
